ProjectTitle: The Decolonization of the Roman Catholic Church in the DRC / Zaire
InitialFeedbackHistory: 20/03/2023 Please note that you used an older DMP template, BOF now uses the [REDACTED] standard DMP template that you can find in DMPonline.be or if you prefer a word template you can use the one from FWO that you can find here: https://www.fwo.be/en/the-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan/. Please use this template for your future DMPs. [REDACTED] Please note that the use of existing literature for analysis is considered data reuse. [REDACTED] ethics review also included in your PRET approval? although this may not be mandatory it is recommended to include ethics review for all research involving human participants: https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/ethics/guidance/humanparticipants [REDACTED] [REDACTED] help selecting a metadata standard please contact rdm@kuleuven.be [REDACTED] [REDACTED] you use onedrive for preservation please make sure the data is on your own onedrive and not on those of students/postdocs, onedrive is linked to the researcher's account and expires after they leave [REDACTED] Please note that KU [REDACTED] now has a data repository RDR that you can use as alternative for [REDACTED] (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr)
